item.title: Spinach-Rice Casserole
item.description: ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 10 min üç≥ Cook time: 40 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 6 Ingredients 4 cups Brown Rice, cooked 2 lbs raw Spinach, chopped 1 cup Onion, chopped 2 cloves Garlic, minced 3 Tbsp Butter 4 Eggs, beaten 1 cup Milk 1 1/2 cups Cheddar, grated 1/4 cup Parsley, chopped 2 Tbsp Tamari 1/2 tsp Salt (or more, to taste) 1/4 cup Sunflower Seeds A few dashes each - Nutmeg; Cayenne; Paprika Directions Saute onions and garlic with salt in butter.
